__TOC__



This week's Hug Day will focus on '''update-manager'''! 

After you have triaged or fixed a bug put your name in the last column and set the row's background to green by adding '''lightgreen''' in the first cell of the column after '''rowbgcolor='''.  This will let people know that the bug in that row has been hugged.

=== 5-a-day-ing ===
During hug days you can also do <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/5-A-Day|5-A-Day]]</nowiki> for this one you can do the following in order to tag your work on the hug day:

* 5-a-day --add-tag hugday-20080925
* Add bugs to 5-a-day as usual
* And when done with hug day run: 5-a-day --remove-tag hugday-20080925

=== Stock Responses ===
<pre>
Thanks for taking the time to report this bug and helping to make Ubuntu better. Could you please add the log files from '/var/log/dist-upgrade/' to this bug report as separate attachments? Thanks in advance.
</pre>

For other problem specific Stock Responses see: <nowiki>[[Bugs-Responses]]</nowiki>

<nowiki>[[DebuggingUpdateManager]]</nowiki> is quite short, and filled with good info, I'd give it a once over.
